attributes.additional_details: To stop the fear in all pets, people suffering from demetia/altzeimers and autistic children and adults from the noise fireworks cause, to help the environment
attributes.background: Ban noisy fireworks and only allow licensed displays

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban sale of fireworks to the public and limit sales to licensed displays only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868

Reduce the decibel limit on fireworks to 85 decibels, to reduce impact: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622900

You can find other petitions calling for changes to rules on releasing fireworks here: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?q=fireworks&state=open
